name: Global Airport Concierge
slogan: We take the stress out of travel
description: We have an established global network of over 700 airports in which we can provide you with a substantial range of luxury airport concierge services. Our greeters can escort passengers through the airport for a quick and stress-free journey. We offer everything from executive cars and baggage assistance to lounges and airport hotels to ensure every trip is as seamless as possible. Our current clients include airlines, credit card companies, entertainment and travel agencies although we do provide services for individual travelers as well.

team.name: Tamara Tankosic
team.bioHtml: Worked at Global Airport Concierge. Experience with Airlines, Bilingual, CRM

jobs.title: Customer Service Advisor
jobs.description:
Main Role and Responsibilities

• Answer client/service provider calls politely and effectively, resolving any issues/queries they may have

• Process client bookings and offer additional services related to their booking

• Answer client/service provider emails articulately and within a timely manner ensuring SLA’s are adhered to

• Completing all of the assigned operational checks regarding client bookings

• Assisting accounts team in collecting payment for all bookings prior to them taking place

• Assisting management in facilitating any admin tasks that are required

Please note additional projects are available depending on a person's personal growth plan and are intended to be an addition for this role and the possible future position (as our call and email volumes permit a lot of downtime work). We have projects ranging from Digital Marketing (Social Media, Creative Writing, Website Content, Promotional Materials), Sales and Account Management (Email marketing, Presentations, Exhibitions and Conferences, Market Research) and Operations (Supplier Relations, Pricing, Negotiation, IT etc)

Preferred Skills

• Ability to communicate to an excellent standard via phone and email to resolve the clients queries

• Ability to provide good attention to detail to ensure all the client requests are adhered to correctly

• Ability to manage and adapt in difficult situations, ensuring the client receives a satisfactory resolution

• Ability to organise themselves to multi-task effectively whilst ensuring standards do not suffer

• Ability to work alone and amongst a team to achieve the common objective

• Confident IT User i.e. Internet and computer literate

• Ability to use MS Excel, MS Word and Outlook to a good level

• Languages would be a benefit but not essential



Job Type: Full-time

Rotational Shift Work

07:00-19:00
19:00-07:00
4 days on, 4 days

Salary: £18,000.00 to £20,000.00 /year
Commission on upselling available + optional paid projects
